'''18w20c''' is the thirty-seventh [[snapshot]] for [[Java Edition 1.13]] released on May 17, 2018<ref>{{snap|18w20c|id=b|May 17, 2018}}</ref>.

This snapshot primarily focused on bug fixes and stability improvements ahead of the full 1.13 release, resolving several long-standing technical issues with world generation and entity behavior.

== Fixes ==
{{fixes|fixedin=18w20c|prefix=Minecraft
|;old
|123524|X amount of Command Blocks in a chunk glitches the chunk, structure blocks, entities, hitboxes and frame rate dramatically
|129571|Skeleton traps are incredibly rare.
|;dev
|121377|First character typed in command blocks doesn't let you hit "done".
|121673|Rotation selector arguments do not allow max to be lower than min.
|123041|Cannot ride a tamed horse, when holding tools, weapons and non-food items.
|123672|Barrier blocks affect sunlight.
|125237|Trident lights up nearby entities when thrown or in ground.
|125304|Furnaces generated in a blacksmith (village) do not smelt any items
|125365|Strong potion of slowness gives slowness level V.
|125625|Glass panes, fences, iron bars and cobblestone walls sometimes fail to upgrade.
|126559|Big chests are split into small chests.
|126993|Some blocks in ocean ruins generate with <code>waterlogged:false</code>.
|128234|Conduits have the wrong breaking particle.
|128243|Dolphins do not try to get into the water.
|128346|Double chest opens as one chest.
|128393|Conduit connects to fences, walls, iron bars and glass panes.
|129517|Game crashes while loading chunks with player heads.
|129657|End Cities don't generate at all in positive co-ordinates.
|;previous
|129709|Chests, signs, beds, shulker boxes, etc. overlay missing texture when mining.
|129732|Conduit cannot be activated by dark prismarine.
|129733|Conduit only spins when it has the maximum number of prismarine blocks.
|129738|Trees generating in the ground or not at all.
|129747|Village generates partially in the ground.
}}</onlyinclude>

== Trivia ==
* This version was released 9 years after [[Java Edition Classic 0.0.11a|Classic 0.0.11a]], the first publicly released version of ''Minecraft''.
* This was one of the final snapshots released before the [[Update Aquatic]] (1.13) officially launched.
